org.scriptreader

Class ScriptReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.scriptreader.ScriptReader

  • public class ScriptReader
extends Object
    Main reader of the script. Uses runScript as a class method to run a string.
    Author:
    joel

        public static void runFullScript(String fullScript)

        Parameters:
        fullScript - string of the full script
